title: 3hrinE - Grace Within Ignorance
description:
3hrinE is the seventh "music project" developed and facilitated by the incarnational presence with the given and used name--"Tony Mikkelson" (once, supposedly, "known", if not remembered, for the underground metal "one man band"--Terminal Descent), beginning in late 2011.

"Grace Within Ignorance" is the second 3hrine title. (Released in Nov. 2012).

(Mp3 320 kbps)


Atonement of the Myriad
Grace Within Ignorance
Longing and Loathing
Samsara Is Nibbana
Almost Unbearable
Empty Sky of Being
Greater Wisdom Prevails
The Maker of Waves
Where Kali Dwells
